name: CRUX Electric Griddle with Nonstick Ceramic Coating, Cool-Touch Handles, and Slide-Out Drip Tray - Indoor Grill for Breakfast, Eggs, Pancakes, and Burgers
short_description: COOK FOR THE CROWD: The extra large griddle is perfect for cooking breakfast for the whole family. With a scratch-resistant 22" surface area, this portable grill provides plenty of space to cook your food evenly with no sticking or burning VERSATILE: Use this stove top griddle to prepare a variety of dishes, to cook vegetables, steak, eggs and bacon, tortillas, and toasted bread. The deep ridges provide perfect grill lines whilst the smooth ceramic surface ensures perfect pancakes every time ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE: The adjustable temperature dial of the electric grill allows for even heat distribution and faster cooking times. The durable non-stick coating with titanium ceramic finish makes the griddle pan 30% faster than others on the market ECOFRIENDLY & EASY TO CLEAN: The griddle grill is PTFE and PTFO-free and equipped with a slide-out drip tray that collects crumbles, fat, and juices. This will ensure that your countertops stay clean and that your food will be healthier and delicious EFFICIENT DESIGN: Made with durable materials & state-of-the-art digital technology, our space-saving & energy efficient flat top grill is designed to complement your cooking needs while adding style, elegance, and personality to your kitchen top
product_description: This electric indoor grill is a stylish and ultra-efficient way to cook brunch and dinner for your friends and family gatherings. Our top-of-the-line kitchen appliance offers a variety of benefits, including: *An eco-friendly design that doesn't sacrifice performance *A Copper Ceramic Coating that provides a slick and durable surface *Heat Resistant Handles to keep you safe while cooking *A Dip Tray that can make up to 15 eggs or pancakes at once *A Matte Black and Copper Titanium finish that will complement any kitchen décor But that's not all! The Ceramic titanium infused non-stick coating is 30% faster than other electric skillets. The extra large 12”x22” cooking surface provides ample space to cook up your favorite dishes, while the Temperature Dial allows for precision cooking. And once you're done, the Slide out Drip Tray collects any fat or juices for easy, mess-free cleaning. Plus, the Healthy Eco coating is PTFE and PFOA free, making it a healthier option for you and your family.

name: AEWHALE Electric Nonstick Extra Larger Griddle Grill-35" Teppanyaki Grill BBQ with Adjustable Temperature &Insulated Handles for Indoor/Outdoor
short_description: 【Insulated Handles】The BBQ grill is equipped with insulated handles on both sides, making it easy for you to move around without burning your hands 【5 Level Adjustable Temperature】The 1800W electric grill heats food quickly and safely in minutes and reaches a maximum temperature of 426°F 【Nonstick Surface & Easy To Clean】The non-stick cooking surface of the AEWHALE electric griddle reduces the need for cooking oil and makes cleaning faster and easier 【Healthy Diet】There is a heat-resistant removable drip tray that collects excess oil and grease to make food preparation healthier. Tips: The bottom water tray is dishwasher safe 【Suitable For Various Occasions】You can cook all kinds of food with just one electric grill. Not only for family gatherings, patio BBQs and dinners with friends, but also for camping, RVing and self-catering vacations

name: Presto 07046 Tilt 'n Drain Big Griddle Cool-Touch Electric Griddle
short_description: Great for every meal: breakfast, lunch, and dinner Huge cooking area holds up to 12 slices of French toast at a time Adjusts from a level cooking surface for pancakes to a tilted draining surface for meats Ceramic nonstick cooking surface—PFAS free Cool-touch base surrounds the front and both sides Backstop ledge for easy food handling Control Master heat control maintains cooking temperatures automatically
product_description: This super-sized griddle is great for any meal. It can cook up to 50% more food than other jumbo griddles. Premium nonstick surface for stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. Slide-out drip tray empties easily. Fully submersible with the heat control removed. Control Master® heat control maintains proper cooking temperature automatically. Huge cooking surface! Cooks as many as 12 slices of french toast at one time. 120 volts, 60 Hz only

name: DASH Deluxe Everyday Electric Griddle with Dishwasher Safe Removable Nonstick Cooking Plate for Pancakes, Burgers, Eggs and more, Includes Drip Tray + Recipe Book, 20” x 10.5”, 1500-Watt - Aqua
short_description: MORE THAN PANCAKES: Perfect for pancakes, quesadillas, burgers, eggs, and more, the Deluxe Everyday Griddle makes preparing any meal more convenient than ever. SPACIOUS COOKING SURFACE: Measuring 20” x 10.5”, this electric griddle is perfect for family meals, entertaining, or cooking a variety of foods for picky eaters all at once. The Heating Probe allows for precise control over your cooking temperature, while the dishwasher-safe removable Cooking Plate makes cleaning a breeze. NONSTICK & EASY TO CLEAN: The PFOA-free, non-stick Cooking Plate surface provides an even cook for consistent results. Comes with a heat-resistant, removable, dishwasher-safe Drip Tray to catch excess grease before it hits your countertop, making cleanup a snap QUICK + EASY: Simply plug it in and set the heat probe to your desired temperature; it heats up in mere minutes, saving you time and energy. Makes a great wedding or new home gift with trendy color options Aqua, Black, Gray, and Red. INCLUDES: Amazon Exclusive, the 1500W Dash Deluxe Everyday Griddle includes anti-slip feet, drip tray, removable nonstick heating surface, recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are easily wiped clean).
product_description: Make delicious meals the whole family will enjoy with the DASH Deluxe Everyday Griddle! Whether you’re cooking pancakes, burgers, or Korean BBQ, the Everyday Griddle makes preparing your favorite meals more convenient than ever. The 20 x 10.5 inch surface heats quickly, saving time and energy, while the Heating Probe gives you precise control over your cooking temperature. Not only does the Drip Tray catch excess grease before it reaches your countertop, both the Cooking Plate and Dip tray are removable and dishwasher safe for fast and easy cleanup.

name: Gourmia 22-Inch XL Electric Griddle Pan - Nonstick Extra Large Ceramic Surface for Breakfast, Pancakes - Non-Toxic Flat Top Cooker - Countertop Kitchen Appliances for Tabletop Indoor Cooking
short_description: 22-INCH XL COOKING SURFACE – Make breakfast, lunch, or dinner for the whole family (or a crowd) with this 22" x 12" extra-large electric griddle for indoor use. Perfect for pancakes, bacon, eggs, crepes, tortillas, quesadillas, pan dulce, and more. NON-STICK CERAMIC COATING – This pancake griddle electric flattop features a PFAS-free ceramic coated surface that allows food to slide around and be lifted away easily, with a pull-out drip catcher tray to handle the greasy messes for you. FAST HEATING RANGE 200°F TO 400°F – This electric flat top griddle's adjustable temperature control from 200-400°F gives you total control with an easy-to-read indicator light. Warm up tortillas, melt cheese, or sear meats at high heat. PULL OUT DRIP CATCHER TRAY – Hate dealing with grease on your indoor griddle? Now you never have to touch it – a built-in drip catcher tray collects the grease for easy disposal. Griddle is easy clean with soap and hot water. NOT dishwasher safe. SMART COMPACT STORAGE – Designed with no handles so it can easily fit inside cabinets and save you valuable storage space. Perfect for kitchens large and small. Backed by 1 Year Gold Standard Warranty + 2 more years once registered.

name: COSTWAY 35" Electric Griddle Teppanyaki Grill, Nonstick Extra Large Cooking Plate for Pancake Barbecue, Indoor Outdoor Table Top Grill with Adjustable Temperature & Drip Tray, 2000W
short_description: 【Spacious Cooking Area for Family Gatherings:】Generous 35" x 9" cooking surface allows you to cook plentiful servings, catering to 6-8 people for a satisfying family meal. The powerful 2000W system ensures rapid and uniform cooking, perfect for hosting parties or feeding larger groups simultaneously. 【Precision Heat Control with 5 Adjustable Levels:】Convenient digital panel enables precise temperature control across 5 stages from 212-464℉, catering to a variety of ingredients such as meats, seafood, vegetables, eggs, crepes, and pancakes. An auto-turn-off indicator light prevents overheating. 【Effortless Maintenance with Non-Stick Surface:】The enhanced non-stick surface retains and distributes heat excellently, ideal for preparing breakfast staples like pancakes and eggs. Its smooth Teflon coating ensures easy food removal and cleaning, promoting a healthier cooking experience compared to traditional grills. The removable drip tray facilitates dishwasher-safe cleaning. 【Healthier Cooking and Safe Handling:】Enjoy preparing a diverse range of foods with minimal to no oil, retaining essential nutrients and flavors while excess fat drains into the removable drip tray. Equipped with 2 insulated cool-touch handles for safe transportation from the kitchen to various locations, making it an excellent choice for family cooking, indoor BBQs, dinner parties, and RV use. 【Quality Build and Comprehensive Accessories:】Constructed from high-quality aluminum with non-slip feet, ensuring a stable and wobble-free Teppanyaki grill on any countertop. The grill includes an array of accessories: 2 egg rings and 6 wooden spatulas, encouraging everyone to join in the cooking process.

name: Chefman XL Electric Griddle with Removable Temperature Control, Immersible Flat Top Grill, Burger, Eggs, Pancake Griddle, Nonstick Extra Large Cooking Surface, Slide Out Drip Tray, 10 x 20 Inch
short_description: EXTRA-LARGE COOKING SURFACE: The 10 x 20 inch indoor grill provides plenty of space to cook up big batches for a crowd or a complete meal. WARM TO SEAR: Adjustable temperature control from 200-420°F allows for versatile cooking for simply warming foods, frying breakfast favorites, or cooking meat. HEALTHIER MEAL MAKING: Cook healthier meals with the drip tray to collect excess oil and grease plus the non-stick electric grill surface reduces the need for added cooking oils. EASY CLEANING: The griddle grill cook top is fully immersible and dishwasher safe - simply remove the temperature control prior to washing. CONVENTIENT COUNTERTOP COOKING: Quickly and conveniently add cooking space to your kitchen for large family dinners or holiday gatherings. RESOURCES: UL approved with advanced safety technology for long-lasting durability, & 1-year assurance provided by Chefman. For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide. 1500 Watts/120 Volts
product_description: The Chefman All-Purpose Nonstick Extra-Large Griddle is the ultra-convenient griddle grill combo for all your cooking needs. From breakfast to dinner, this generously-sized griddle instantly adds extra cooking space to your kitchen with temperatures from 200-420°F for added versatility. The nonstick surface allows for easier food removal and the slid-out drip tray helps keep oil and grease away from your food. When it's time to clean up, simply remove the temperature control and clean the griddle in the dishwasher or sink. • 10 x 20 inch cooking surface • 200-420°F adjustable temperature control • Dishwasher-safe griddle top • Nonstick surface • Slide-out drip tray

name: Presto 07072 22-Inch Extra Large Griddle, 22"x 13", Low Profile Design, Ceramic Nonstick, Black
short_description: Extra-large 22x13 inch cooking surface Low-profile design for easy storage Ceramic nonstick surface - PFAS free Control Master heat control maintains cooking temperature Slide-out tray catches drippings Backstop ledge for easy food handling Heavy cast aluminum base Fully immersible with heat control removed
product_description: The extra-large Presto® Slimline™ griddle makes enough food to feed the entire family and has a low-profile design for super easy storage. With a PFAS-free ceramic surface, you can enjoy worry-free nonstick cooking with all your favorite breakfast, lunch, and dinner favorites. Make bacon and eggs, sausage, and French toast on the big 13- x 22-inch cooking surface. It also cooks perfect grilled cheese sandwiches every time, as well as Reubens, burgers, and chicken fillets, and the removable tray catches any drippings. The Control Master® heat control maintains the selected cooking temperature automatically, and with the heat control removed, the griddle is fully immersible for cleaning.

name: Presto 07073 XL Tilt-N-fold Electric Griddle, Black
short_description: Versatility and convenience for breakfast, lunch, and dinner Adjusts from a level cooking surface to a tilted draining surface Flip-down levers tilt the grilling surface to drain meat while cooking Ceramic nonstick cooking surface is PFAS free Extra-large 254 sq. in. cooking surface for making big meals Legs fold in and drip tray locks in place for compact storage Fits in most standard 18-inch cabinets
product_description: This Tilt-n-Fold XL™ Griddle offers convenience and versatility for breakfast, lunch, and dinner and still stores neatly in a kitchen cabinet. It adjusts from a level cooking surface for eggs, pancakes, and sandwiches to a tilted surface for draining bacon, burgers, and steak. Simple flip-down levers tilt the grilling surface for draining meats while cooking. For compact storage, just fold in the legs and the drip tray locks in place. The folded griddle easily fits in most standard 18-inch cabinets. The adjustable Control Master® heat control maintains cooking temperatures automatically. An extra-large 254 sq. in. ceramic nonstick cooking surface is PFAS free and assures stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. The slide-out drip tray removes for quick cleanups. Griddle is fully immersible with the heat control removed.

name: AEWHALE 35" Electric Nonstick Extra Large Griddle Grill-Teppanyaki Grill BBQ Indoor/Outdoor with Adjustable Temperature,Detachable for Easy Cleaning,Extra Wide
short_description: 【Wider Version】The width of the plate is 4 inches more compared to the 9" plate, allowing more delicious food to be cooked at one time 【Detachable Stainless Steel Baffle】The electric griddle grill comes with a stainless steel baffle to prevent grease splatters, while the removable design makes it easy to clean and carry 【Nonstick Surface & Easy To Clean】The non-stick cooking surface of the AEWHALE electric griddle reduces the need for cooking oil and makes cleaning faster and easier 【Adjustable Temperature】The indoor grill has an adjustable thermostat with a temperature range of 205°F - 420°F. You can cook all kinds of food with just one electric grill 【Insulated Handles】The BBQ smokeless grill is equipped with insulated handles on both sides, making it easy for you to move around without burning your hands
